Leadership.name: Chong Kok Yang
Leadership.bio: A final year student passionate about process design and leading the chapter to provide value to all members.

Leadership.name: Bob Williams
Leadership.bio: Focuses on connecting students with industry professionals and organizing plant tours and networking events.

Business Team.name: Charlie Brown
Business Team.bio: Manages the chapter's finances and secures sponsorships to fund our events and projects.

Event Team.name: Diana Miller
Event Team.bio: Handles all chapter communications, manages social media, and ensures our community stays engaged.

courseRepresentatives.name: Eileen Paw Zhang Hui
courseRepresentatives.bio: Representing the interests and concerns of students from the Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering programme.

courseRepresentatives.name: Jason Liau Yi Jun
courseRepresentatives.bio: Serving as the bridge between the Bioengineering student body and the AIChE student chapter.

courseRepresentatives.name: Lim Wei Xiang
courseRepresentatives.bio: Advocating for students in the Chemistry and Biological Chemistry programme within our chapter.

studentAdvisors.name: Alex Chen
studentAdvisors.bio: A graduate student providing mentorship and guidance to undergraduate members based on their academic and industry experience.

studentAdvisors.name: Samantha Lee
studentAdvisors.bio: A final-year student helping junior members navigate their curriculum and prepare for their final year projects.

escLiaison.name: Frank Green
escLiaison.bio: Acts as the official bridge between the AIChE Student Chapter and the main NTU Engineering Student Council.
